headline: The Worst May Be Over for Housing. Building-Supplies Firm QXO Bets on a Rebound.
summary: The company, led by serial acquirer Brad Jacobs, is buying lumber distributor Kodiak Building Partners for $2.25 billion.

headline: QXO to Buy Kodiak Building for $2.25 Billion
summary: QXO agreed to buy closely held building materials distributor Kodiak Building Partners for about $2.25 billion in cash and stock.
